name: Symbiosis (itch) (43ther)
description:
Entry for Wowie Jam!

Symbiosis is a puzzle game in which you have to plant every single seed in the level without having dead plants. Plants are composed of 3 different parts (stem, leaves and flowers). Each part  modifies the behavior of a plant. Flowers determine the area that gets affected by pollen, pollen becomes toxic and kills the affected plant unless both plants share the same stem. Leaves give bonus points if neighboring plants share the same leaves.

Team Members

43ther - Programmer & Game Designer

Precious - Artist & Game Designer
